movies.title: Masterminds
movies.plot: A night guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history.

events.title: Steve Chambers and Kelly Campbell rob Loomis Fargo

movies.title: Mean Girls
movies.plot: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.
